name: PegasusBot
description: What is the project about? The project is an automated trading bot on telegram platform. What makes your project unique? It allows users to automate their trades, featuring OpenAi tweet interpretation of selected tweeter influencers. The bot interpret the tweet of an influencer and automatically launch a trade of all the subscribed users. History of your project. Token launched on August 13th Whatâ€™s next for your project? We have a solid roadmap available on our documentation. We want to implement severals features to the bot in order to make it even more decentralized and automatic What can your token be used for? Subscribe to the bot service, trade, buy services on our platform.
